title: 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment available for lease hnd over
posting_body: spacious 724 sqft apartment up for lease in the heart of Austin, 401 Masterson Pass.
The apartment has nice wooden floor all throughout the house and bedroom and huge walk in closet is carpeted.
Kitchen and bathroom has been renovated a year ago with granite countertop and black cabinet.
We are looking to transfer the lease which is viable until december this year, you can renew the lease after that.
The apartment comes with a huge balcony and storage closet too.
Benefits: the apartment is in walking distance from the NAMCC mosque, dollar tree, HEB.
Walmart is 8 mins drive and dollar general, washeteria, domino’s, desi grocery store, world food market is 3 mins drive away.
Bus stand is a 1 minute walk away.
Open parking spot, basket ball court, swimming pool
